mapper.select: select exercise_cat_a_name from exercise_cat_a where exercise_cat_a_number = #{exerciseCatANumber}
mapper.insert: insert into exercise_rec (EXERCISE_RECORD_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, PRO_NO, COACH_EMAIL, EXERCISE_RECORD_NAME, EXERCISE_RECORD_KG, EXERCISE_RECORD_TIMES, EXERCISE_RECORD_WEIGHT, EXERCISE_RECORD_REGDATE) values (COUNT_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{proNo}, #{coachEmail}, #{exerciseRecordName}, #{exerciseRecordKg}, #{exerciseRecordTimes}, #{exerciseRecordWeight}, #{exerciseRecordRegdate})
mapper.select: select MEMBER_EMAIL as memberEmail, COACH_EMAIL as coachEmail, PRO_NO as proNo from pro_pay where member_email = #{memberEmail}

select EXERCISE_RECORD_NO as exerciseRecordNo, MEMBER_EMAIL as memberEmail, PRO_NO as proNo, COACH_EMAIL as coachEmail, EXERCISE_RECORD_NAME as exerciseRecordName, EXERCISE_RECORD_KG as exerciseRecordKg, EXERCISE_RECORD_TIMES as exerciseRecordTimes, EXERCISE_RECORD_WEIGHT as exerciseRecordWeight, EXERCISE_RECORD_REGDATE as exerciseRecordRegdate from exercise_rec where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}

select EXERCISE_NUMBER as exerciseNumber, EXERCISE_CAT_A_NUMBER as exerciseCatANumber, EXERCISE_CAT_B_NUMBER as exerciseCatBNumber, EXERCISE_CONTENT as exerciseContent, EXERCISE_CAL as exerciseCal from exercise where exercise_number in (select exercise_number from program_exercise where pro_no in (select pro_no from pro_pay where member_email = #{memberEmail}))

select EXERCISE_NUMBER as exerciseNumber, EXERCISE_CAT_A_NUMBER as exerciseCatANumber, EXERCISE_CAT_B_NUMBER as exerciseCatBNumber, EXERCISE_CONTENT as exerciseContent, EXERCISE_CAL as exerciseCal from exercise where EXERCISE_NUMBER = #{exerciseNumber}
mapper.update: update exercise set EXERCISE_CONTENT = #{exerciseContent}, EXERCISE_CAT_A_NUMBER = #{exerciseCatANumber}, EXERCISE_CAT_B_NUMBER = #{exerciseCatBNumber}, EXERCISE_CAL = #{exerciseCal} where EXERCISE_NUMBER = #{exerciseNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into upload (UPLOAD_NUMBER, EXERCISE_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CAT_A_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CAT_B_NUMBER, UPLOAD_SIZE, UPLOAD_ORIGINAL, UPLOAD_STORED, UPLOAD_DIVIDE) values (COUNT_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{exerciseNumber}, #{exerciseCatANumber}, #{exerciseCatBNumber}, #{uploadSize}, #{uploadOriginal}, #{uploadStored}, #{uploadDivide})

insert into exercise (EXERCISE_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CAT_A_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CAT_B_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CONTENT, EXERCISE_CAL) values (#{exerciseNumber}, #{exerciseCatANumber}, #{exerciseCatBNumber}, #{exerciseContent}, #{exerciseCal})
mapper.select: select UPLOAD_NUMBER, EXERCISE_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CAT_A_NUMBER, EXERCISE_CAT_B_NUMBER, UPLOAD_SIZE, UPLOAD_ORIGINAL, UPLOAD_STORED, UPLOAD_DIVIDE from upload
